comment: Darr always provides a positive boost of energy when we come to lab. His personality makes the lab more enjoyable than expected. He could not have taught S&C L any better as his first time. All students like him as he is funny but also well respected. If you do not get an A in this class, it's most likely because you skipped lab and quizzes.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Would take again
